author: ianna
body:
- Fully migrate to using Tracker parameters from DB:
  - Replace Tracker parameters taken from configuration file fragment with identical parameters retrieved from DB tag
  - Introduce Tracker topology dependency on Tracker parameters
  - Implement Tracker parameters from DD reader
  - Update schema to fully eliminate all Tracker constants amen from configuration

NOTE: a new DB tag is needed to test this PR. Further modifications of HLT configurations are needed to remove explicit definition of Tracker parameters.

To test for run1:

Step 1: Produce the tag:

```
cmsRun CondTools/Geometry/test/trackergeometrywriter.py
```

Step 2: Customise the GT:

```
process.GlobalTag.toGet = cms.VPSet(cms.PSet(record = cms.string('PTrackerParametersRcd'),
                                             tag = cms.string('TK_Parameters_Test02'),
                                             connect = cms.untracked.string("sqlite_file:./myfile.db")
                                             )
                                    )
```

To produce the tag for other scenarios, please, modify CondTools/Geometry/test/trackergeometrywriter.py

***\* This work and PR will be discussed during AlcaDB meeting next Monday. ****
